name: Nuckalavee
resistance: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons

traits.name: Charge
traits.desc: If the nuckalavee moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a greataxe attack, that target must succeed on a DC 16 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the nuckalavee can make one attack with its hooves against it as a bonus action.

traits.name: Horrific Appearance
traits.desc: Any creature that starts its turn within 20 feet of the nuckalavee must make a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature is frightened until the start of its next turn. If a creature’s saving throw is successful, the creature is immune to the nuckalavee’s horrific appearance for the next 24 hours.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The nuckalavee has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magic effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The nuckalavee makes four attacks: two with its greataxe, one bite attack, and one attack with its hooves.

actions.name: Greataxe
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) slashing damage.

actions.name: Hooves
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) slashing damage.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d4 + 5) piercing damage.

actions.name: Poisonous Breath (Recharge 5–6)
actions.desc: The nuckalavee exhales a cloud of caustic gas in a 20-foot cone. Creatures in this area must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 21 (6d6) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
